nodes.text: After the death of its parent, this flesh raider baby was orphaned and left in the middle of a path. This baby would have died, had it not been for a Jedi Padawan who came across it inside a backpack. The Padawan fed the baby some guid meat before bringing it to Master Quilb at the Jedi Temple to decide on how they might aid the baby.

This baby appears in the mission entitled "Flesh Eating Baby" in the 2011 BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic. The mission is located on the planet Tython and is only accessible to Republic aligned players.
